thread.section_title: Hotel Declic - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfort zone
thread.title_full: Comfort zone - Review of Hotel Declic, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kathryn L
title: Comfort zone
text: Hotel Declic was good value for money. We found the bed very luxurious and comfortable. We chose the deluxe room with buffet breakfast included. Room service was quick, high quality ingredients and large servings. Our room was the galaxy theme which was really fun and romantic, definitely not boring. The staff where very helpful and spoke very good English. Would definitely stay there again if travelling back to Paris.
